ai-ud7.9:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was wandering in the land of the Mallas together with a large Saṅgha of mendicants when he arrived at a brahmin town of the Mallas named Thūṇa.
ai-ud7.9:1.3_0: The brahmins and householders of Thūṇa heard:
ai-ud7.9:1.4_0: “It seems the ascetic Gotama—a Sakyan, gone forth from a Sakyan family—while wandering in the land of the Mallas has arrived at Thūṇa, together with a large Saṅgha of mendicants.”
ai-ud7.9:1.5_0: They filled the well with grass and chaff right to the top, thinking,
ai-ud7.9:1.6_0: “Don’t let these shavelings, these fake ascetics drink the water.”
ai-ud7.9:2.1_0: And then the Buddha left the road, went to the root of a tree, and sat down on the seat spread out.
ai-ud7.9:2.2_0: While sat the Fortunate One addressed venerable Ānanda, (saying):
ai-ud7.9:2.3_0: “Please, Ānanda, bring drinking water from that well.”
ai-ud7.9:3.1_0: After this was said, venerable Ānanda addressed the Fortunate One, (saying):
ai-ud7.9:3.2_0: “Just now, sir, the brahimns and householders of Thūṇa filled the well with grass and chaff right to the top, thinking,
ai-ud7.9:3.3_0: ‘Don’t let these shavelings, these fake ascetics drink the water.’
ai-ud7.9:4.2_0: And for a third time, the Buddha said to Ānanda:
ai-ud7.9:4.3_0: “Please, Ānanda, bring drinking water from that well.”
ai-ud7.9:4.4_0: “Yes, sir,” replied Ānanda. He did as he was asked.
ai-ud7.9:4.5_0: As he approached the well, all the grass and chaff erupted out of the well-mouth. The water stood transparent, unclouded, and clear right up to the top, seeming to overflow.
ai-ud7.9:5.2_0: “It’s incredible, it’s amazing! The Realized One has such psychic power and might!
ai-ud7.9:5.3_0: For when I approached that well, all the grass and chaff erupted out of the well-mouth. The water stood transparent, unclouded, and clear right up to the top, seeming to overflow.”
ai-ud7.9:5.4_0: Gathering a bowl of drinking water he went back to the Buddha, and said to him,
ai-ud7.9:5.5_0: “It’s incredible, sir, it’s amazing! The Realized One has such psychic power and might!
ai-ud7.9:5.6_0: For when I approached that well, all the grass and chaff erupted out of the well-mouth. The water stood transparent, unclouded, and clear right up to the top, seeming to overflow.
ai-ud7.9:5.7_0: Drink the water, Blessed One! Drink the water, Holy One!”
ai-ud7.9:6.1_0: Then, knowing the significance of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud7.9:7.2_0: if water is there all the time?
ai-ud7.9:7.3_0: Having cut off craving at the root, having cut off craving,
ai-ud7.9:7.4_0: who would go out on a quest?”
